text: BBC News is a free news channel, broadcast by BBC. It began on 9th November 1997 as BBC News 24 until it was rebranded to its current name on 21 April 2008. The BBC's website, bbc.co.uk, also features a section called BBC News. This section contains news articles and videos of broadcasts from the news channel. == Other websites == * *BBC News at TV ARK *The BBC News Styleguide ==BBC News HD== BBC News HD was launched on 10 December 2013 alongside the sister channels CBeebies HD, CBBC HD, BBC Four HD and BBC Three HD. Category:1997 establishments in the United Kingdom News News
title: BBC News (TV channel)
